creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: painted with coat-of-arms, bird crest and motto 'Sola Juvat Virtus', ends with initial 'AS'; center of stand with large floral cornucopia within chain pattern; cover with crest and scroll finial; arms are those of Stewart, 3rd son of Lord Blantyre
object_name: Sauce tureen with arms of Stewart
title: Sauce tureen with arms of Stewart
